item.title: Comment on Hello world! by A WordPress Commenter
item.dc:creator: A WordPress Commenter
item.description: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from <a href="https://en.gravatar.com/">Gravatar</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this is a comment.
To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard.
Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Comment on How to Install AutoDock Vina on Ubuntu 20.04 by Russell Cox
item.dc:creator: Russell Cox
item.description:
sudo gedit ~/.bashrc
does not work - generates an error. But
gedit ~/.bashrc
works OK
item.content:encoded:
sudo gedit ~/.bashrc

does not work – generates an error. But

gedit ~/.bashrc

works OK

item.title: Comment on How to Install SRA Toolkit in Ubuntu 20.04 by Santi
item.dc:creator: Santi
item.description: Hi, I really like the way you explain the steps, I am really grateful for it. Nonetheless, when I used this "command tar -vxzf sratoolkit.tar.gz" I got an error that says: "tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now". How can I solve this? Thanks again for your help.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I really like the way you explain the steps, I am really grateful for it.
Nonetheless, when I used this “command tar -vxzf sratoolkit.tar.gz” I got an error that says: “tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now”. How can I solve this?
Thanks again for your help.
